p: Sample 1 from flash purification were mixed with MALDI matrix solution (ratio 50: 50). The matrix solution consisted of 10 mg/mL α-cyano-4-hydroxycinnamic acid (Sigma–Aldrich, Taufkirchen, Germany) in water/acetonitrile (50: 50, by volume) with 0.2% (volume ratio) trifluoroacetic acid. 1 μL of the mixture was then spotted on the MALDI target and air-dried.
